file.name: Maps_MapDbId_LinkageGroups_GET.yaml
file.content:
info:
  title: BrAPI
  version: ''
openapi: 3.0.0
paths:
  /maps/{mapDbId}/linkagegroups:
    get:
      summary: Get the Linkage Groups of a specific Genomic Map
      description: Get the Linkage Groups of a specific Genomic Map. A Linkage Group is the BrAPI generic term for a named section of a map. A Linkage Group can represent a Chromosome, Scaffold, or Linkage Group.
      parameters:
      - description: The internal db id of a selected map
        in: path
        name: mapDbId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/page'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/pageSize'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/authorizationHeader'
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                title: LinkageGroupListResponse
                type: object
                required:
                - metadata
                - result
                properties:
                  '@context':
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/Context'
                  metadata:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/metadata'
                  result:
                    type: object
                    required:
                    - data
                    properties:
                      data:
                        type: array
                        items:
                          $ref: '#/components/schemas/LinkageGroup'
          description: OK
          headers: {}
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/400BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/401Unauthorized'
        '403':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/403Forbidden'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/404NotFound'
      tags:
      - Genome Maps

Error: parse: paths: /maps/{mapDbId}/linkagegroups: get: operation "": parameters: parse parameter "": resolve "#/components/parameters/page" reference: component by reference "#/components/parameters/page" not found
